For openers use the format - opener:Opener Name;Ability1,Ability2
For fights use the format - fight:Fight Name:Start-End-Delaybuffs

opener:Late Trick;Standard Finish,Flourish,Bloodshower,Potion,Reverse Cascade,Hold .7,Devilment,Technical Step,AutoOGCD 1,AutoGCD,AutoOGCD 2,Standard Step,AutoOGCD 1,AutoGCD
opener:Early Trick;Standard Finish,Flourish,Bloodshower,Potion,Devilment,Technical Step,Reverse Cascade,AutoOGCD 2,Fountainfall,Standard Step,AutoOGCD 1,AutoGCD
opener:Early Trick 2;Standard Finish,Devilment,Technical Step,Cascade,Potion,AutoGCD,AutoOGCD 2, AutoGCD, Standard Step,AutoOGCD 1,AutoGCD
opener:Selfless;Standard Finish,Flourish,Technical Step,Devilment,Bloodshower,Potion,Reverse Cascade,AutoOGCD 2,Fountainfall,Standard Step,AutoOGCD 1,AutoGCD
fight:Default;100000-100001-False
fight:Bahamut;200-220-True,300-320-True,400-420-True
